price: 71. Kaadu Nabii Ibraahim kee Nabii Luutuy kaal yeemene naggosneeh, Qiraaqh deqsitta Baaxok seehadah barkattosne baaxó fanah ken neyyeeqe (Shaam Baaxo kinnuk).
arabic: وَنَجَّيۡنَٰهُ وَلُوطًا إِلَى ٱلۡأَرۡضِ ٱلَّتِي بَٰرَكۡنَا فِيهَا لِلۡعَٰلَمِينَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: wanajjaynāhu walūṭan ilā al-arḍi allatī bāraknā fīhā lil'ʿālamīna
